Konohamaru clones himself and holds his opponent in place. He then transform himself and his clones into bikini-clad girls who swarm his opponent. While the opponent is distracted, Konohamaru and a clone ram them with a Rasengan.

== Trivia ==
* When used against certain male characters such as [[Iruka]], [[Jiraiya]], and [[Hiruzen Sarutobi]], instead of konohamaru ramming his opponent with a Rasengan, One of the girls approaches them and try to kiss them, causing the latter to have a massive nosebleed that sends them flying.
